trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Brighton
There was one other sighting in Brighton on or around May 27th 2012
divs: sighting detailswalking the dog, out of corner of my eye say it flying above the house in the sky appx 2-400 feet high. dumbbell shaped object. two balls or orbs glowing red\ink connected by a very short unliit walkway or platform. straight flight path. i was in awe and my dog actually sat down and watched it with me. it made a low beep\humming sound followed by what sounded like a squeek, like a hinge needing oil. beep...beep...beep...beep...beep...squeak. repeated constantly, as though it were coming from the object itself from in the air. object continued on it's path and went over the trees and i lost sight of it.
Summary: Two orbs colored redish-pink connected by some kind of short unlit walkway. Dumbbell shaped almost, slow moving.
